title: Payment Arrangement Request
description: A customer has received a disconnection notice and is calling to request a payment arrangement to avoid shut-off.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's account and verify the past-due balance and disconnection date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the amount owed and the scheduled shut-off date.

tasks.description: Check the customer's eligibility for a payment arrangement based on their payment history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is eligible for a payment plan.

tasks.description: Offer the available payment plan options (e.g., splitting the balance over 3 months) and process the customer's selection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the payment arrangement and cancels the pending disconnection order.
